snippet: The lawyer, Thomas Green, said during a status hearing that he was concerned that information disclosed to the news media may inhibit former House Speaker J. Dennis Hastert’s right to a fair trial.
lead_paragraph: The lawyer, Thomas Green, said during a status hearing that he was concerned that information disclosed to the news media may inhibit former House Speaker J. Dennis Hastert’s right to a fair trial.

headline.main: Illinois: Hastert Lawyer Deplores Leaks to News Media
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Hastert Lawyer Deplores Leaks To News Media
